name: exchange-rate-system
description: Comprehensive exchange rate management and deal automation system

scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev -w services/pricing-core" "npm run dev -w services/p2p-parser" "npm run dev -w services/rapira-parser" "npm run dev -w services/deal-automation" "npm run dev -w services/notification-service" "npm run dev -w services/reporting-service"
scripts.dev:apps: concurrently "npm run dev -w apps/api-gateway" "npm run dev -w apps/manager-panel" "npm run dev -w apps/partner-cabinet"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:services && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:services: npm run build -w services/pricing-core && npm run build -w services/p2p-parser && npm run build -w services/rapira-parser && npm run build -w services/deal-automation && npm run build -w services/notification-service && npm run build -w services/reporting-service
scripts.build:apps: npm run build -w apps/api-gateway && npm run build -w apps/manager-panel && npm run build -w apps/partner-cabinet
scripts.test:all: npm run test -w services/pricing-core && npm run test -w services/p2p-parser && npm run test -w services/deal-automation
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run docker:up && sleep 30 && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.monitoring:up: docker-compose up -d prometheus grafana elasticsearch kibana
scripts.monitoring:down: docker-compose stop prometheus grafana elasticsearch kibana

author: Development Team
